command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute 
SELECT id, name, unit, CAST(unit AS CHAR) as unit_str, costPerUnit, restaurantId
FROM ingredients 
WHERE name LIKE '%Scallops%';
stdout:
id	name	unit	unit_str	costPerUnit	restaurantId
150002	Scallops (Hokkaido Hotate)	lb	lb	19.2000	1
